attributes.action: Give Joanna Lumley a Knighthood for her work securing Ghurka rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Miss Lumley has been a resolute pillar in the upstanding for the rights for Ghurka soldiers and friends. She has sacrificed her own assests (such as her car) to help fund this movement. Due to this I believe (and hope others agree) that Joanna Lumley deserves recgnition from the crwn in addition to her OBE.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
